divs: Sighting DetailsJust step outside for a smoke and looked north toward St johns Mi(I am 5 miles south)and seen a very bright light shooting across the sky (heading north east) leaving a trail like a shooting star but it lasted till it went behind the trees (6 sec or so). It lite up the sky where it was and left a very long trail. Right after that the dogs in the neighborhood started barking. It looked like a comet to me.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in DeWitt
There were no other sightings in DeWitt on or around August 28th 2013
Summary: Look like a comet to me.
